name: Landscape Manager
description:
This game was made in 48h during the Ludum Dare 43 compo game jam : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/landscape-manager

In this game you'll play as an applier for the role of Lead Landscape Developpment Architect Manager. You'll be tested on your skill : use your mouse to cut down unnecessary leaves, and try to get the requested number of flowers. This game is quite hard, you should expect to restart some levels a couple of times.

Here is a gif of the first level :


Unfortunately, the game doesn’t display the current level number, so as a reference you can find a screenshot of all levels in this imgur album : https://imgur.com/a/CbY2udw. Please don’t look at it if you haven’t already tried the game to avoid spoiler.

Tools used : Unity, Audacity, Bxfr, Bosca Ceoil, PyxelEdit, Aseprite.

I've never done any Mac or Linux build before and couldn't test them so please tell me if it doesn't work, I'll fix it as soon as possible !

Some known (minor) bugs :

  • for some reason the web version displays a line in level 1. It’s an object I’ve deleted from the hierarchy a long time ago. I have no idea why it’s still popping here.
  • when restarting a level, sometimes your life will have an initial small decrease. It’s not much of an annoyance though, and it might disappear if you try the level once again.
